paragraphs.content: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fish’s belly,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Jonah prayed unto the Lord his God out of the fish’s belly,

paragraphs.content: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the LORD, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the Lord, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.

paragraphs.content: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.

paragraphs.content: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.

paragraphs.content: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.

paragraphs.content: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O LORD my God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O Lord my God.

paragraphs.content: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the Lord: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

paragraphs.content: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.

paragraphs.content: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that that I have vowed. Salvation is of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that that I have vowed. Salvation is of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And the LORD spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And the Lord spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
